title: Hendrix & Typography
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110213041232im_/http:/typophile.com/files/texturizer_hendrix1_3870.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110213041232im_/http:/typophile.com/files/texturizer_hendrix2_4569.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110213041232im_/http:/typophile.com/files/texturizer_hendrix3_4387.jpg)

So I just found these lovely beauties by Gui Borchert. Would you believe these amazing pictures of Jimi Hendrix are completely made of texturized type?
author: Pin
